W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_DETAIL.text: Spirits are said to dwell on the lower level, which can be reached by this lift.

W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_000_DETAIL.text: So there are spirits in Delta Base after all...

W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_100_DETAIL.text: So there are spirits in Delta Base after all...

W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_200_DETAIL.text: So there are spirits in Delta Base after all...

W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head back to the Heavens and search for the next one.

W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.

W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.text: Probably about time they help you search for spirits.

W10_GIMK_MIDO_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_MIDO_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.text: Is this the spirit-like fiend that supposedly dwells on the lower level?

W10_GIMK_MIDO_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_MIDO_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.text: Is this the spirit-like fiend that supposedly dwells on the lower level?

W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a space station like something from a sci-fi movie on the other side of the door. Are there really spirits in a place like this?
